title: Bell Qualifier DLX MIPS

product_details.description: Value-packed street helmet featuring MIPS safety tech and an auto-darkening ProTint shield.

analysis: The Qualifier DLX MIPS brings advanced rotational impact protection (MIPS) and a light-reactive ProTint shield into an incredibly accessible price bracket. For riders on a budget who refuse to compromise on top-tier safety mechanisms and everyday convenience, this Bell model is class-leading.
